customrecordtype.description: Project Requirement. It's purpose may vary depending on its type.

customrecordcustomfield.description: High level description of the requirement with the format "As a (role) I want (something) so that (benefit)".
customrecordcustomfield.help: High level description of the requirement with the format "As a (role) I want (something) so that (benefit)".
customrecordcustomfield.label: End-user description

customrecordcustomfield.description: These acceptance criteria define, at a high level, the test criteria which will confirm that this user story is working as required. For example: Functional: Can I save my order and come back to it later? / Non-functional: Can I view the order at any time (24 hours per day or 24/7/365) up to and including delivery? The acceptance criteria helps drive the test cases creation.
customrecordcustomfield.help: These acceptance criteria define, at a high level, the test criteria which will confirm that this user story is working as required. For example: Functional: Can I save my order and come back to it later? / Non-functional: Can I view the order at any time (24 hours per day or 24/7/365) up to and including delivery? The acceptance criteria helps drive the test cases creation.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Acceptance Criteria

customrecordcustomfield.description: Level of importance of this requirement to determine WHEN it should be implemented. 1=HIGHEST and 5=LOWEST priority.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Level of importance of this requirement to determine when it should be dealt with in the context of the other requirements.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Priority (1 to 5)

customrecordcustomfield.description: Estimated high-level effort level to implement the requirement. The numbering scale can be adjusted to how each team assesses effort estimation.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Estimated high-level effort level to implement the requirement. The numbering scale can be adjusted to how each team assesses effort estimation.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Effort (estimation points)

customrecordcustomfield.description: QA kickoff session between the developers working on a particular requirement and QA may include risks and approaches to the implementation, aligning to the user story objectives and acceptance criteria. Test cases creation should be driven from the results of this session.
customrecordcustomfield.help: QA kickoff session between the developers working on a particular requirement and QA may include risks and approaches to the implementation, aligning to the user story objectives and acceptance criteria. Test cases creation should be driven from the results of this session.
customrecordcustomfield.label: QA Kickoff notes

customrecordcustomfield.description: QA Demo session occurs after the implementation of a requirement. Developers and QA discuss the implementation, any testing already done by the developer, risks, etc. QA provides advice on testing as if they were the ones that would execute the test cases. The validity of test cases is re-assessed, and both parties agree upon the test cases that are next to be executed by the developer.
customrecordcustomfield.help: QA Demo session occurs after the implementation of a requirement. Developers and QA discuss the implementation, any testing already done by the developer, risks, etc. QA provides advice on testing as if they were the ones that would execute the test cases. The validity of test cases is re-assessed, and both parties agree upon the test cases that are next to be executed by the developer.
customrecordcustomfield.label: QA Demo Notes

customrecordcustomfield.description: Skills required for the completion of this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Skills required for the completion of this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Required Skills

customrecordcustomfield.description: Aimed at providing additional notes that may arise after executing test cases, to be taken into account for QA and Business Owner during UAT.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Aimed at providing additional notes that may arise after executing test cases, to be taken into account for QA and Business Owner during UAT.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Post-implementation Notes

customrecordcustomfield.description: Whether test cases should be created for this requirement. This field is very helpful for QA to filter through the requirements that need to have test cases designed and executed for.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Whether test cases should be created for this requirement. This field is very helpful for QA to filter through the requirements that need to have test cases designed and executed for.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Requires Test Cases

customrecordcustomfield.description: Whether this requirement is a gap.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Whether this requirement is a gap.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is a gap

customrecordcustomfield.description: If this requirement is a gap, specify the type of gap.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If this requirement is a gap, specify the type of gap.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Gap type

customrecordcustomfield.description: Requirement status within the context of the project's execution.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Requirement status within the context of the project's execution.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_rt_prm_estimate.label_entitystatus_custform_atlas_rt_prm_estimate]

customrecordcustomfield.description: Date in which this requirement was signed-off by the customer after UAT.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Date in which this requirement was signed-off by the customer after UAT.
customrecordcustomfield.label: UAT Signoff Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: Whether this requirement was approved by the customer. It implies the customer's agreement to the captured requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Whether this requirement was approved by the customer. It implies the customer's agreement to the captured requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Requirement Approved

customrecordcustomfield.description: Date in which this requirement was approved by the customer.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Date in which this requirement was approved by the customer.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Requirement approval date

customrecordcustomfield.description: Channel to which this requirement is associated. Especially important in shared implementation omni channel projects.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Channel to which this requirement is associated. Especially important in shared implementation omni channel projects.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Channel

customrecordcustomfield.description: Undertaking this requirement belongs to.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Undertaking this requirement belongs to.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Engagement

customrecordcustomfield.description: Implementation start date for this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Implementation start date for this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_rt_prm_estimate.label_startdate_custform_atlas_rt_prm_estimate]

customrecordcustomfield.description: Implementation due date for this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Implementation due date for this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_rt_prm_invoice.label_duedate_custform_atlas_rt_prm_invoice]

customrecordcustomfield.description: For requirements that are in themselves a single task, this field specifies who it is assigned to.
customrecordcustomfield.help: For requirements that are in themselves a single task, this field specifies who it is assigned to.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Assigned to

customrecordcustomfield.description: Requirements this requirement depends on.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Requirements this requirement depends on.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Depends on

customrecordcustomfield.description: Requirements that are blocked by this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Requirements that are blocked by this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is a blocker for

customrecordcustomfield.description: Determines whether the current requirement is awaiting assignment. A workflow should mark check this automatically whenever it is assigned.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Determines whether the current requirement is awaiting assignment. A workflow should mark check this automatically whenever it is assigned.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Assigned

customrecordcustomfield.description: Requirement types in an agile context (Epic, User Story, Task)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Requirement types in an agile context (Feature, Requirement, Task or Bug)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Requirement Type

customrecordcustomfield.description: Description of the User Story, Bug, or Task.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Description of the User Story, Bug, or Task.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_rt_prm_description.label_description_custform_atlas_rt_prm_description]

customrecordcustomfield.description: List of requirements of type Feature to be used via scripting to set the value of a Requirement's parent upon creation of a new User Story. This field ensures only Epics can be selected as a parent for a new Requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.help: List of requirements of type Feature to be used via scripting to set the value of a Requirement's parent upon creation of a new User Story. This field ensures only Epics can be selected as a parent for a new Requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Parent Feature

customrecordcustomfield.description: List of requirements of type User Story or Bug to be used via scripting to set the value of a Task's parent upon creation of a new Task. This field ensures only User Stories or Bugs can be selected as a parent for a new Task.
customrecordcustomfield.help: List of requirements of type User Story to be used via scripting to set the value of a Task's parent upon creation of a new Task. This field ensures only User Stories can be selected as a parent for a new Task.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Task Parent

customrecordcustomfield.description: Determines the planning status of a requirement within the context of the project's execution.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Determines the planning status of a requirement within the context of the project's execution.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_rt_prm.label_custcentercategory_atlas_buyer_planning_cat]

customrecordcustomfield.description: Status specific to bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Status specific to bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bug Status

customrecordcustomfield.description: Resolution status specific to bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Resolution status specific to bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bug Resolution

customrecordcustomfield.description: Severity of Bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Severity of Bugs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bug Severity

customrecordcustomfield.description: The expected behavior of the requirement that was not fulfilled, and caused the bug.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The expected behavior of the requirement that was not fulfilled, and caused the bug.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bug Expected Results

customrecordcustomfield.description: The actual results that caused the bug.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The actual results that caused the bug.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bug Actual Results

customrecordcustomfield.description: Date in which this requirement, bug or task is expected to be completed.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Date in which this requirement, bug or task is expected to be completed.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Expected Completion Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: User that signed off on the implemented functionality during the UAT phase.
customrecordcustomfield.label: UAT Signed Off By

customrecordcustomfield.description: Company employee that approved the definition of the requirement and its acceptance criteria.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Company employee that approved the definition of the requirement and its acceptance criteria.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Requirement approved by

customrecordcustomfield.description: Employees that are to be notified via email every time a requirement or bug is created or updated.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Employees that are to be notified via email every time a requirement or bug is created or updated.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Watchers

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enable email notifications to assignees and/or watchers whenever this item is created or updated.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable email notifications to assignees and/or watchers whenever this item is created or updated.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Enable Notifications

customrecordcustomfield.description: When email notifications are enabled, notify the assignee of this requirement, task or bug.
customrecordcustomfield.help: When email notifications are enabled, notify the assignee of this requirement, task or bug.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Notify Assignee

customrecordcustomfield.description: When email notifications are enabled, notify the watchers of this requirement, task or bug.
customrecordcustomfield.help: When email notifications are enabled, notify the watchers of this requirement, task or bug.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Notify Watchers

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the module the requirement relates to.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Module

customrecordcustomfield.help: Detail how the customers requirement will be met in NetSuite. If you need more space, use the requirement record notes.
customrecordcustomfield.label: NetSuite Solution

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the NS employee who has approved this requirement
customrecordcustomfield.label: NetSuite Approved By

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the business process owner from the customer for this requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Business Process Owner

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter Percent of Completion of the Requirement.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Percent of Completion

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select Project Vertical
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vertical

customrecordcustomfield.description: Whether this requirement has been approved by NetSuite or not.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Approved by NetSuite

customrecordcustomfield.description: Date requirement was approved by NetSuite
customrecordcustomfield.label: NetSuite Requirement Approval Date
